vclaim: Kraft will "pay you" if you purchase a non-cream cheese dessert.
title: Is Kraft ‘Paying You’ To Skip Cheesecake Due to a Cream Cheese Shortage?
subtitle: A limited-time offer in December 2021 promised to reimburse 18,000 people to replace their homemade cheesecake with a different dessert.
author: Bethania Palma
